sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.PRODUCT_ID productId,A.PRODUCT_NBR productNbr,A.PRODUCT_NAME productName,A.PRODUCT_DESC productDesc, A.MANAGE_GRADE manageGrade,A.PRODUCT_TYPE productType,A.PRODUCT_PROVIDER_ID productProviderId, A.STATUS_CD statusCd,A.STATUS_DATE statusDate,A.EFF_DATE effDate,A.EXP_DATE expDate, A.PROD_FUNC_TYPE prodFuncType,A.EXT_PROD_ID extProdId,A.VALUE_ADDED_FLAG valueAddedFlag,A.INNER_PROD_NBR innerProdNbr, A.COMMON_REGION_ID commonRegionId,A.IS_TEMPLATE isTemplate,A.COOPERATION_TYPE cooperationType FROM product A
PRODUCT_ID=#productId# PRODUCT_NBR=#productNbr# PRODUCT_NAME=#productName# PRODUCT_TYPE=#productType# PRODUCT_PROVIDER_ID=#productProviderId# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# EFF_DATE=#effDate# EXP_DATE=#expDate# COMMON_REGION_ID=#commonRegionId# COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType# EXT_PROD_ID=#extProdId#
sqlMap.update: update product set status_cd = #statusCd#,PRODUCT_PUBLISHER = #productPublisher# where product_id = #productId#

update prod_offer set STATUS_DATE=utc_timestamp()
OFFER_TYPE=#offerType# PROD_OFFER_NAME=#prodOfferName# INNER_OFFER_NAME=#innerOfferName# PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER=#prodOfferPublisher# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# EFF_DATE=#effDate# EXP_DATE=#expDate# OFFER_NBR=#offerNbr# OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# BRAND_ID=#brandId# SERV_BRAND_ID=#servBrandId# TEMPLET_ID=#templetId# DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD=#defaultTimePeriod# PROD_OFFER_DESC=#prodOfferDesc# EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID=#extProdOfferId# EXP_PROC_METHOD=#expProcMethod# VALUE_ADDED_FLAG=#valueAddedFlag# MANAGE_GRADE=#manageGrade# PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT=#prodOfferInitialamount# EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION=#expireHandleCondition# COMMON_REGION_ID=#commonRegionId# MANAGE_GRADE2=#manageGrade2# CREATE_DT=#createDt# SIMPLE_SPELL=#simpleSpell# VERSION=#version# INNER_OFFER_NBR=#innerOfferNbr# PROD_OFFER_TRAIT=#prodOfferTrait# COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType# LOGO_FILE_ID=#logoFileId#
PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.PRODUCT_ATTR_ID, A.ATTR_SPEC_ID, A.DEFAULT_VALUE, A.DISPLAY_TYPE, B.IS_CUSTOMIZED, B.CODE ATTR_SPEC_CODE, B.CHAR_SPEC_NAME ATTR_SPEC_NAME, B.VALUE_TYPE PAGE_IN_TYPE, B.DESCRIPTION ATTR_SPEC_DESC, B.DEFAULT_VALUE SPEC_DEFAULT_VALUE FROM PRODUCT_ATTR A, CHAR_SPEC B WHERE A.ATTR_SPEC_ID = B.CHAR_SPEC_ID AND A.PRODUCT_ID = #productId# A.DISPLAY_TYPE = #displayType# A.tenant_id=#tenantId# AND B.tenant_id=A.tenant_id

SELECT B.COMPONENT_ID,B.NAME,B.STATE,B.ORG_ID FROM ORG A, COMPONENT B WHERE A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID AND B.STATE != 'X' AND A.tenant_id=#tenantId# AND B.tenant_id=#tenantId# A.ORG_ID=#orgId# B.COMPONENT_ID=#componentId#

SELECT A.PROD_OFFER_ID prodOfferId,A.OFFER_TYPE offerType,A.PROD_OFFER_NAME prodOfferName,A.INNER_OFFER_NAME innerOfferName, A.STATUS_DATE statusDate,A.PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER prodOfferPublisher,A.STATUS_CD statusCd,A.EFF_DATE effDate,A.EXP_DATE expDate, A.OFFER_NBR offerNbr,A.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID offerProviderId,A.BRAND_ID brandId,A.SERV_BRAND_ID servBrandId,A.TEMPLET_ID templetId, A.DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD defaultTimePeriod,A.PROD_OFFER_DESC prodOfferDesc,A.EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID extProdOfferId,A.EXP_PROC_METHOD expProcMethod, A.VALUE_ADDED_FLAG valueAddedFlag,A.MANAGE_GRADE manageGrade,A.PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT prodOfferInitialamount,A.EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION expireHandleCondition, A.COMMON_REGION_ID commonRegionId,A.MANAGE_GRADE2 manageGrade2,A.CREATE_DT createDt,A.SIMPLE_SPELL simpleSpell,A.VERSION version, A.INNER_OFFER_NBR innerOfferNbr,A.PROD_OFFER_TRAIT prodOfferTrait,A.COOPERATION_TYPE cooperationType ,A.LOGO_FILE_ID logoFileId,A.OPERATE_CODE operateCode FROM PROD_OFFER A
PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# OFFER_TYPE=#offerType#
PROD_OFFER_NAME=#prodOfferName#
INNER_OFFER_NAME=#innerOfferName# STATUS_DATE=#statusDate# STATUS_CD!=#statusCd# EFF_DATE=#effDate#
PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER=#prodOfferPublisher# EXP_DATE=#expDate#
OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# OFFER_NBR=#offerNbr# BRAND_ID=#brandId#
SERV_BRAND_ID=#servBrandId# TEMPLET_ID=#templetId#
DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD=#defaultTimePeriod#
PROD_OFFER_DESC=#prodOfferDesc#
EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID=#extProdOfferId#
EXP_PROC_METHOD=#expProcMethod#
VALUE_ADDED_FLAG=#valueAddedFlag#
MANAGE_GRADE=#manageGrade#
PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT=#prodOfferInitialamount#
EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION=#expireHandleCondition#
COMMON_REGION_ID=#commonRegionId#
MANAGE_GRADE2=#manageGrade2#
COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType#

SELECT a.OFFER_PROD_RELA_ID offerProdRelaId, a.ROLE_CD roleCd, a.PROD_OFFER_ID prodOfferId, a.PRODUCT_ID productId, a.MAX_COUNT maxCount, a.MIN_COUNT minCount, a.RULE_TYPE ruleType, a.DEFAULT_COUNT defaultCount, a.PROD_EXIST_TYPE prodExistType, a.COMPOENT_TYPE compoentType, b.PRODUCT_NAME productName, b.EXT_PROD_ID extProdId, c.name productProviderName FROM OFFER_PROD_REL a , product b , org c where a.PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# and a.product_id = b.product_id and b.product_PROVIDER_ID = c.org_id

select a.PROD_OFFER_ID prodOfferId, a.PRODUCT_ID productId, b.PRODUCT_NAME productName from OFFER_PROD_REL a ,product b , org c where a.PROD_OFFER_ID = 801010000452 and c.partner_type = 1 and a.product_id = b.product_id and b.product_PROVIDER_ID = c.org_id

select a.PROD_OFFER_RELA_ID prodOfferRelId, a.ROLE_CD roleId, a.OFFER_A_ID offerAId, a.OFFER_Z_ID offerZId, a.MAX_COUNT maxCount, a.MIN_COUNT minCount, a.RELATION_TYPE_CD relTypeCd, a.EFF_DATE effDate, a.EXP_DATE expDate, b.prod_offer_name prodOfferName, b.EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID extProdOfferId from PROD_OFFER_REL a , prod_offer b
a.PROD_OFFER_RELA_ID=#prodOfferRelId# a.ROLE_CD=#roleId# a.OFFER_A_ID=#offerAId# a.OFFER_Z_ID=#offerZId# a.RELATION_TYPE_CD=#relTypeCd#
and a.offer_a_id = b.prod_offer_id

select a.pricing_info_id pricingInfoId, a.pricing_name pricingName, a.pricing_type pricingType, a.pricing_desc pricingDesc, a.price_sign priceSign, a.price_cha priceCha, a.eff_date effDate, a.exp_date expDate, a.billing_priority billingPriority, a.license_nbr licenseNbr, a.applic_type applicType, a.cycle_type cycletype, a.create_date createDate, a.status_date statusDate, a.status_cd statusCd, b.PRICING_TARGET_ID pricingTargetId from pricing_plan a,PROD_OFFER_PRICING b where a.status_cd!='11' and b.PROD_OFFER_ID = #prodOfferId# and a.PRICING_INFO_ID = b.PRICING_INFO_ID

SELECT b.busi_id busiId,b.partner_code partnerCode,b.busi_code busiCode,b.serv_code servCode,b.busi_name busiName, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(b.eff_date,"%Y.%m.%d"),'~',DATE_FORMAT(b.exp_date,'%Y.%m.%d')) as effectiveDate, b.BUSI_TYPE busiType,b.description from prod_offer f,SETTLE_SP_BUSI_DEF b where b.SERV_CODE = f.prod_offer_id and b.PARTNER_CODE = f.offer_provider_id and f.prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId# GROUP BY b.busi_id,b.partner_code,b.busi_code,b.serv_code,b.busi_name,b.eff_date,b.exp_date,b.busi_type,b.description

select CYCLE_DEF_ID as cycleDefId,PARTNER_CODE as partnerCode,BUSI_CODE as busiCode,CYCLE_TYPE as cycleType, CYCLE_COUNT as cycleCount,ACCT_TYPE as acctType,RUN_HOUR as runHour,BILL_END_DATE as billEndDate, CYCLE_SEGMENT as cycleSeqment,PRIORITY as priority,DESCRIPTION as description,SYNC_FLAG as syncFlag, EFF_DATE as effDate,EXP_DATE as expDate,CREATE_DATE as createDate,VERSION as version, STATUS_CD as statusCd,STATUS_DATE as statusDate from SETTLE_CYCLE_DEF
CYCLE_DEF_ID=#cycleDefId# PARTNER_CODE=#partnerCode# BUSI_CODE=#busiCode# STATUS_CD=#statusCd#
order by CYCLE_DEF_ID desc

select d.busi_id,d.busi_name,r.rule_id,r.rule_name,o.org_id,o.name org_name from settle_rule_org_rel l,org o,settle_rule r,settle_sp_busi_def d where o.org_id = l.org_id and r.rule_id = l.rule_id and r.partner_code = d.partner_code and r.busi_code = d.busi_code and r.serv_code = d.serv_code and r.RAISE_FLAG = 0 d.busi_id=#busiId# d.partner_code=#partnerCode# d.busi_code=#busiCode# d.serv_code=#servCode# r.rule_id=#ruleId#

select RULE_ID as ruleId, PARTNER_CODE as partnerCode, BUSI_CODE as busiCode, SERV_CODE as servCode,RULE_NAME as ruleName, RULE_TYPE as ruleType, RULE_TYPE as ruleType2Num, CHARGE_DIR as chargeDir, MONEY_UNIT as moneyUnit, PRIORITY as priority, DESCRIPTION as description, SYNC_FLAG as syncFlag, EFF_DATE as effDate, EXP_DATE as expDate, CREATE_DATE as createDate, VERSION as version, STATUS_CD as statusCd, STATUS_DATE as statusDate from SETTLE_RULE
RULE_ID=#ruleId# BUSI_CODE=#busiCode# SERV_CODE=#servCode# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# RAISE_FLAG=#raiseFlag#
order by RULE_ID asc

select p.PRICE_PLAN_ID pricePlanId, p.HALF_CYCLE_FLAG halfCycleFlag, p.CYCLE_UNIT cycleUnit, p.CYCLE_TYPE cycleType, p.CYCLE_SYNC_FLAG cycleSyncFlag, p.SUB_EFFECT_MODE subEffectMode, p.SUB_DELAY_UNIT subDelayUnit, p.SUB_DELAY_CYCLE subDelayCycle, p.UNSUB_EFFECT_MODE unSubEffectMode , p.UNSUB_DELAY_UNIT unSubDelayUnit , p.UNSUB_DELAY_CYCLE unSubDelayCycle, p.VALID_UNIT validUnit, p.VALID_TYPE vaildType, p.FIXED_EXPIRE_DATE fixedExpireDate, p.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, p.STATUS_CD statusCd from PRICE_PLAN_LIFECYCLE p where p.status_cd = 10 p.PRICE_PLAN_ID=#pricePlanId#

select group_concat(a.PRODUCT_NAME) productNames from PRODUCT a,OFFER_PROD_REL b,offer_prod_rel_pricing r where a.PRODUCT_ID = b.PRODUCT_ID and b.OFFER_PROD_RELA_ID = r.offer_prod_rela_id and r.status_cd='10' and r.PRICING_TARGET_ID=#pricingInfoId#

select price_id priceId, price_name priceName, price_type priceType, price_type priceType2Num, pri_pricing_info_id priPricingInfoId, description description, price_desc priceDesc, create_date createDate, version version, status_cd statusCd, eff_date effDate, exp_date expDate, status_date statusDate from component_price where status_cd!='11' price_id=#priceId# pri_pricing_info_id=#priPricingInfoId# price_name LIKE concat('%',#priceNam#,'%')
